item.description:
Food of the (lesser known) Gods

Pick a deity, any deity. March’s theme is “food of the gods.”
Google “deity” and the majority of sites will refer to gaming deity rather than gods of antiquity or modern religions. That says something about our culture, but I am not sure what.
If you haven’t found your God, I recommend http://en.wikipedia.o... as a starting place.
As usual, this is about your creatively and personal interpretation.
Plan to cook onsite unless your recipe takes more than an hour to prepare. The fun is in the cooking here all together.
Gimme that ole time religion and some yummy treats.

Oh and you must not miss this http://www.chocolated...

and for fun and games http://www.philosophe...
item.how_to_find_us: my home so you will notice me and the dogs will send address a few days before
item.name: The Hartford Cooking And Recipes March Meetup
